sect1.title: gf 1.0
sect1.para: Gamedev Framework aims to publish a stable version 1.0 as soon as possible.
Here are the the roadmap that will lead to version 1.0:

listitem.para: Set the version number of the dependencies, especially SDL
Decide on the features to be implemented
Try to make some tests with basic classes

sect1.para: For now, the possible features not yet implemented are:

listitem.para: Roguelike toolkit (virtual console, square grid algorithms: FOV, shortest path, ...)
Put your own feature: open an issue with the "enhancement" label

sect1.title: Guarantees until 1.0
sect1.para: Until 1.0, there is no strong guarantee on a stable ABI or stable API. Yet, we try to keep the API and ABI as stable as possible until 1.0.
